Quickstrike:



Quickstrike nodded. "Okay. But what about Megatron an' Hell Beast? 
They're makin' me nervous." He studied Black Arachnia, she looked 
mad. Sometimes he was the worst with her. He managed to get her mad 
with one stupid thing he didn't realize. He tried to think what it 
was.

He stepped up behind her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia nsrrowed her eyes and turned away, "Kitkat is 
being 
> a....female cat. But, were constructing a submarine. Actually, we 
could use 
> your help with that.."
